author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008070/

Dive into the dystopian cyberpunk world of Neo Berlin 2087 – a unique third- and first-person action RPG crafted for fans of immersive single-player experiences. Uncover a deep, narrative-driven story through never-before-seen gameplay, new levels, cinematic cutscenes, and intense combat. Meet new characters Bryan and Phoenix in this action-packed Gamescom 2025 reveal.

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom #gamescom2025
title: Neo Berlin 2087 - Gamescom 2025 Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011346

Bricks who click together, stick together LEGO Voyagers is a new 2-player co-op adventure that’s all about building spaceships, excitement and friendships.

Share a screen or play online – whatever works for you.
The game will also feature Friend’s Pass, allowing you to play together using just one purchased copy of the game. Grab your brick buddy and get ready for an incredible adventure!

Coming soon to PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.

Developed by Light Brick Studio. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #lego
title: LEGO Voyagers - Release Date Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The Club is Yours in EA SPORTS FC 26, with innovation powered by your feedback in every mode. EA SPORTS FC 26 launches 26 September, pre-order now: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/ea-sports-fc/


Meet this year’s ICONs, the most fan requested in history! Pre-order* EA SPORTS FC™ 26 Ultimate Edition by 26 August to receive an untradeable 1 of 5 Player Pick 93+ OVR ICON Player Item and an exclusive 99 shooting Player Evolution in EA SPORTS FC™ 25 (sold separately), as well as an untradeable Football Ultimate Team™ ICON Player Item for EA SPORTS FC™ 26.

Play your way in EA SPORTS FC 26 with an overhauled gameplay experience powered by community feedback, Manager Live Challenges that bring fresh scenarios to the new season, and Archetypes inspired by greats of the game.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #easportsfc #fc26 #easportsfc26
title: EA Sports FC26 - Icons Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005308

Williams™ Pinball Volume 9 is now available in Pinball FX!

This classic collection brings three iconic tables together - PIN·BOT™, TAXI™, and WHO dunnit™ - each delivering a unique design, theme, and gameplay. Celebrate the golden age of pinball with vibrant style, addictive multiballs, and countless surprises for players of every skill level.

This pack features:

TAXI™: Jump into the driver’s seat of this high‑score cabbie extravaganza! Pick up famous passengers like Santa Claus, Dracula, Gorbie, or PIN·BOT himself.

WHO dunnit™: Investigate crime scenes, gather clues, interrogate suspects, and solve the case - all within an amazing noir environment from the 1930s.

PIN·BOT™: Embark on a journey through the Solar System! Fill the lamp matrix to unlock PIN·BOT’s visor and shoot jackpots on this iconic 1980s sci-fi classic.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pinballfx #williamspinball #taxi #pinbot #whodunnit
title: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball Volume 9 Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Amon was raised in a Vault monster-worshipping cult—until the Vault was opened and the creature turned on everyone he loved. As the only survivor, he dedicates his life to finding and killing as many of these beasts as he can. He is a warrior-poet—introspective and unflinching to his duty—but despite his hardened appearance, he has a warm attitude, often regaling comrades in arms with stories and advice earned throughout his travels.

We’ll be rolling out a Gameplay Overview, Character Short, and Vault Hunter page for all 4 Vault Hunters before launch – so stay tuned!

Borderlands 4 is now available for pre-order on PlayStation®5! 

#ps5 #ps5games #borderlands4

Rated Mature
title: Borderlands 4 - Character Short: Amon (Demons) | PS5 Games

description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013179

Arctic Awakening is a first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy bot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

Arctic Awakening releases on PS5 September 18, 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Arctic Awakening - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

The award-winning indie favourite is finally coming to consoles! Relax, build, and explore in this cozy tile-based world where every placement shapes a charming landscape.
The strategy-puzzler Dorfromantik is out now, for all console players to experience its soothing gameplay and beautiful hand-painted art style.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #dorfromantik
title: Dorfromantik - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
A longshoreman's job is never done. As the lead operator, you will be tasked with getting hands-on in the daily operation and continuous expansion of your father’s dock in the wake of a devastating hurricane. When the ships roll in, unload heavy cargo. When the flatbeds pull up, ship out vital materials and medicine to those who need it most. Stay on top of repairs and maintain massive equipment to foster the growth of your operation– become more than just any port in a storm.  

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Docked - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015287

Gloomy Eyes is a single-player “self-coop” cozy horror adventure set in a Tim Burton-esque world. Coming to PS5 September 12th, 2025.

Players will alternate between controlling two unique characters as they embark on a journey to bring sunlight back to a world plunged into nasty, bitter darkness. The game is set in a lovingly haunting visual aesthetic, reminiscent of Corpse Bride and The Nightmare Before Christmas.

There’s no gore or jump scares, just an enchanting, haunting atmosphere and a whimsical tale of forbidden companionship that will tug at your undead heartstrings.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Gloomy Eyes - Story & Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/midnight-murder-club/

Face your friends in a heart-pounding, hilarious horror party game in the halls of a pitch-black mansion.

Armed with a flashlight, revolver, and proximity chat, every match is a chaotic tale of screaming, surprises and tense shootouts.

In the darkness, every decision counts.

Available now on PS5® consoles and PC.

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames
title: Midnight Murder Club - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/becastled/

Becastled blends cozy city building with challenging tower defense strategy. Build a medieval castle and grow your settlement during the day, then defend it from nightly sieges by waves of enemies. Manage resources, place buildings, recruit units, and expand your kingdom. How long can your fortress hold the dark?

Coming to PS4 & PS5 on October 23, 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #becastled
title: Becastled - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
